title: One Person Injured After Bb Gun Breaks Citybus Window

(WLFI) — A CityBus passenger was injured after a BB gun shot hit the bus window. Lafayette police say the bus was on the 1800 block of Shoshone Drive when the window was broken around 3 P.M. Tuesday. Lt. Justin Hartman says a passenger suffered minor injuries from the broken glass. The investigation is ongoing, and no arrests have been made at this time. News 18 will continue to provide updates as they become available.
